FYI this .7z is using LZMA2, which isn't supported by 7-Zip (4.65). Have to get a recent beta to open it.

Luis is just a fucking troll; this torrent is completely clean. Scanned with AVG and Kaspersky and it turned up nothing. Also it contains no suspicious files; they all seem almost exactly like every other minecraft torrent. It's just java files and sounds.

If anyone is having trouble extracting the .7z file then get the latest version of 7-zip or winRAR and everything should be fine.
